key_points: 22-year-old Gabrielle Petito from Long Island is missing while traveling in Wyoming.
Petito was traveling with her boyfriend in a white 2012 Ford Transit van.
Her mother, Nicole Schmidt, expressed deep concern and distress over her daughter's disappearance.
Petito and her boyfriend were documenting their cross-country trip on YouTube, planned to arrive in Portland, Oregon, in October.
The last communication from Petito was a text message received by her mother on August 30.
Petito was reported missing to the Suffolk County Police Department on September 11.
Petito's boyfriend is not missing, and their van was recovered in Florida.
Petito is described as a white female, approximately 5-foot-5 and 110 pounds, with blonde hair, blue eyes, and several tattoos.
Local police and the FBI Tampa Field Office are actively assisting in the investigation.
The public is urged to contact Crime Stoppers or the North Port Police Department with any information.
